textPlain: Expressive interaction design is the missing layer in robotics. The future isn’t just functional robots - it’s robots that feel natural to use and are designed from the ground up for expressive human-robot interaction.We will continue iterating Le Lamp to make it expressive and useful in the upcoming weeks.our github: https://github.com/humancomputerlab/LeLamp/community: https://discord.gg/wVF99EtRzg
